xwikidoc.title: MentionsTranslations
xwikidoc.content: rendering.macro.mention.name=사용자 언급 ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.description=Insert a user mention. ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.reference.name=Reference ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.reference.description=The mentioned user or group reference. ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.style.name=Display Style ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.style.description=The style choice of the mention (this is only supported for user mentions). ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.anchor.name=Anchor ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.anchor.description=The anchor to be used for linking to that mention (this anchor should be unique to the document as much as possible). ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.type.name=Type ### Missing: rendering.macro.mention.parameter.type.description=The type of the mentioned actor. ### Missing: org.xwiki.mentions.DisplayStyle.FULL_NAME=Full name of the user ### Missing: org.xwiki.mentions.DisplayStyle.FIRST_NAME=First name of the user only ### Missing: org.xwiki.mentions.DisplayStyle.LOGIN=Username ### Missing: XWiki.Mentions.MentionsConfigurationClass_mentionsColor=Mentions Color ### Missing: XWiki.Mentions.MentionsConfigurationClass_mentionsColor.hint=The color of the mentions to the current user (note: used as the value of a background-color CSS attribute). ### Missing: XWiki.Mentions.MentionsConfigurationClass_selfMentionsColor=Self Mentions Color ### Missing: XWiki.Mentions.MentionsConfigurationClass_quoteActivated=Activate the quotes ### Missing: XWiki.Mentions.MentionsConfigurationClass_quoteActivated.hint=Defines if a quote of the text surrounding a mention is included in the user mention notifications. ### Missing: mentions.tip=When editing in WYSIWYG, type @ and then start typing letters to get suggestions to mention a user. ### Missing: mentions.configuration.heading=Mentions Preferences
